mapper.select: select brbrno from beers_brand where beers_brand.brbrnm = #{brand}
select cateno from beers_cate where beers_cate.catenm = #{cate}
select ctryno from beers_ctry where beers_ctry.ctry = #{ctry}
mapper.insert: insert into beers(cateno, brbrno, ctryno, br_desc, comp, achl, vol) values(#{cateno}, #{brbrno}, #{ctryno}, #{describe}, #{company}, #{alchol}, #{volume})
mapper.select: select * from beers inner join beers_brand on beers.brbrno = beers_brand.brbrno inner join beers_cate on beers.cateno = beers_cate.cateno inner join beers_ctry on beers.ctryno = beers_ctry.ctryno order by brno limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
